# Running AlphaFold on NCI Gadi HPC


<div class="questions">

### Questions

- How Can I Run AlphaFold on NCI?
</div>

<div class="objectives">
  

AlphaFold is availble on NCI's Gadi. This HPC is more than 10x larger than Artemis, so offers potentially far more significant resources.

Gadi uses a general architechure similar to Artemis so any workflows you have developed can be readily adapted to run on Gadi.

AlphaFold is documented here:
[https://opus.nci.org.au/display/Help/Colabfold](https://opus.nci.org.au/display/Help/Colabfold)
